quote: Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. It's the only way to become what you were meant to be.
Holding on to toxic relationships is what keeps us from growing.
I am your friend. And there are many others like me who would prefer you not perish.
A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
Good intentions aren’t enough. They’re not meaningless, but that’s where we have to start, not where we end.
Do or do not. There is no try.
Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
